items.title: Cashew Cheese Plate
items.descript: With melon, local honey, fig jam, and seed crackers.

items.title: Beet and Walnut Tartare
items.descript: Served with turmeric cream, lettuce, pickles, and flax crisps.

items.title: Stuffed Cucumber
items.descript: English cucumber stuffed with almond and dill cheese, topped with an apple and lemon vinaigrette.

items.title: Brussel Sprout Salad
items.descript: Shredded brussel sprouts, pecans, apples, and dried blueberries tossed in a creamy, Jamaican allspice dressing.

items.title: Chili Marinated Vegetable Burrito
items.descript: Flax and carrot tortilla stuffed with chili marinated veggies, avocado, cashew cheese, and spinach. Served with pico de gallo, sour cream, and cauliflower/coconut rice.

items.title: Mushroom Burger
items.descript: Coconut, flax, and sesame seed bun, mushroom and pumpkin seed burger, cashew cheese, red onion, pickles and brazil nut mayo. Served with a garden salad.

items.title: Pumpkin Curry
items.descript: Potato, chickpeas, red peppers, carrots and roasted pumpkin all cooked in a coconut based curry sauce. Served with Brown rice.

items.title: Peanut Noodles
items.descript: Flat Rice noodles, spinach, celery and broccoli cooked in a slightly sweet and spicy peanut sauce. Topped with crushed peanuts.

items.title: Black Bean and Pepper Stew
items.descript: Black Beans, tomatoes, and peppers cooked in a chocolate and ancho pepper sauce. Served with brown rice, cashew sour cream and fresh avocado.

items.title: Cheesy Penne
items.descript: Brown rice penne, zucchini, spinach and broccoli simmered in a cashew and coconut sauce. Topped with cashew parmesan.

items.title: Kale Salad
items.descript: Kale, spinach, carrots, kelp noodles, red cabbage, beets, pumpkin seeds and avocado. Tossed in a roasted red pepper and sundried tomato vinaigrette.

items.title: Cinnamon and Apple Chia Pudding
items.descript: Made with pumpkin seed milk, topped with marinated apples.

items.title: Gingerbread Cake
items.descript: Iced with vanilla cashew cream and topped with raspberry sauce.
